name: The Aurora Wager
description:
The game is about you (Jebe), your buddy Frits, your nemesis Frederik, and your wager to see who can make it to the North Pole first! By hot air balloon, of course. You will have to master navigating the airways, and explore the world to find the means to venture ever further.

The Aurora Wager was originally created for the 7DRL Jam in 2013. We're really busy working on Volo at the moment, but someday we hope to give this game the love it deserves.

Credits:

  • Martijn Zandvliet @m_zandvliet - Design, Programming, Terrain
  • Robin Vink @no_twitter - Design, 3D Art
  • Michael Manning @mikmanner - Sound Effects, Music

Do you dream of flying? Check out Volo Airsport, our wingsuit skydiving game.
